text: @DWUhlfelderLaw I work for a school system working with teachers.  My job requires me to interact with hundreds of people every week.  I have heart disease, and I am immuno- compromised.  How do you suppose I live if I get coronavirus?  I guess I am just expendable, according to @marcorubio
